#job  #HTML #makeup #CSS #JS #Cyprus #office

We're looking for¬†a Senior HTML/Markup Developer to join an international product-developing company with relocation to Limassol, Cyprus. 

As a Senior HTML/Markup Developer, you will be responsible for developing efficient, fast, and adaptive interfaces, collaborating with developers and web designers to improve products, and introducing ideas, solutions, and optimizations for existing applications. 
                                                                                                                                                                                                        Position: Senior HTML/Markup Developer
Location: Cyprus, Limassol
–ûffice, full time
The Salary: 3000-5000 euro net
Clever Recruiting

Key Requirements:

3+ years as an HTML coder
Expert in HTML, CSS
Strong UI/UX design and cross-browser layout skills
Proficient in CSS/JS animation
Experienced with Sass/Less
Knowledge of web performance optimization
Familiar with Figma/Sketch/Photoshop
Intermediate English proficiency

Benefits:

Relocation package (flights, 2-week hotel stay)
Official Cyprus/EU employment, family member registration
24 days Annual Vacation
Employee fitness, language courses, office meals

For contact @an_galushko

#vacancy #fintech #job #dubai #uae #hybrid #office #lead #ruby #fulltime #relocation #senior #ror #trading #rspec #rails

We are looking for a Lead Ruby Developer for our client -  an international UAE-based rapidly growing fintech/prop trading company.

Location: Dubai 
You can start work remotely and relocate after 3-6 months.

üõ†Stack: Ruby 3.2, Ruby on Rails 7.1, Sidekiq, PostgreSQL, RSpec, AWS

We are offering:
üîπFrom 8000 $ net monthly
üîπThe small and flat IT team
üîπVery strong tech team
üîπZero bureaucracy, start-up atmosphere

What kind of qualifications we are looking for:
‚ñ™Ô∏è5+ years of working experience as a senior engineer
‚ñ™Ô∏èExperience with Ruby (object-oriented programming)
‚ñ™Ô∏èExperience with MT4/5 Manager API (big plus)
‚ñ™Ô∏èExperience developing in the trading industry/trading platforms (big plus)
‚ñ™Ô∏èExperience with storing and processing high amounts of data
‚ñ™Ô∏èExperience with frontend frameworks like React (pre)
‚ñ™Ô∏èKnowledge of setting up and maintaining an infrastructure
‚ñ™Ô∏èYou like to have CI/CD
‚ñ™Ô∏èA real team player with experience in leading a team of engineers
‚ñ™Ô∏èStrong spoken English (–í2/C1) to work with international team
